refsect1.programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform -odac -M0 ;;;RT audio I/O with MIDI in ;-iadc ;;;uncomment -iadc if RT audio input is needed too ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o cpsmidi.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 ksmps = 32 nchnls = 2 0dbfs = 1
instr 1 ; move pitch bend wheel while you play
kcps cpsmidib asig oscil 0.6, kcps, 1 printk2 kcps outs asig, asig
endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore> f0 20 ;sine wave. f 1 0 16384 10 1
e </CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
